_xResult.title: In the Stars Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made silver gown with mini-pleats
_xResult.longdesc:
With a deep neckline that will flatter any shape or figure, this stunner is made from fine pleated silver lamé and is designed to create a fluid silhouette that adds a glamorous touch. Thousands of tiny micro-pleats add structure to the bodice and make for great volume and movement as you walk. Snag this made to measure piece in blue or gold as well. Trust us—the pictures do not do it justice!

You need an evening gown made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
